problem.markdown:
Which of the following are correct statements regarding Crossovers? [ ] Dragging the feet along the ground is recommended. [x] Crouch slightly while keeping the back straight. [ ] Maintain the trunk at a 60 degree angle to the direction of travel while allowing the hips to move naturally. [x] To start, cross the trail leg first to the front of the lead leg and step in the direction of travel to return to the starting position.
[explanation] Pick the feet up with each step. Avoid dragging the feet along the ground. Crouch slightly while keeping the back straight. Maintain the trunk perpendicular to the direction of travel while allowing the hips to move naturally. Cross the trail leg first to the front of the lead leg and step in the direction of travel to return to the starting position. [explanation]
